{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Netgear XR500 01.jpg |image1_size = 300px |caption = Nighthawk Pro Gaming Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.netgear.com/npg/xr500/ |sp = https://www.netgear.com/support/product/XR500 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Netgear |model = XR500 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = January 9, 2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Netgear_XR500 |wlclass = AC2600 |series = Nighthawk |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = PY315100319 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 29764958 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8065; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7-A |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 1.7 GHz <!-- 1.7 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;DumaOS;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3.3,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, VHT160, DFS |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = http://www.routerlogin.net |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 01/08/2018 |estprice = 300 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAB278JT9892 |asin = B078GWJ44Z |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9984; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[https://kb.netgear.com/000053094/How-do-I-log-in-to-the-router-interface-of-my-XR500-Nighthawk-gaming-router Web GUI]: http://www.routerlogin.net
*OEM: [[Delta Networks]] - Board ID: 29764958 :Hardware ID: 29764958+0+256+512+4x4+4x4+Cascade {{See also|Netgear XR450|Netgear XR700|Netgear}} :nqam enabled on 2.4GHz 802.11n radio (800Mbps)
*[https://fccid.io/NCC/CCAI18LP0440T9 NCC CCAI18LP0440T9]
==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://community.netgear.com/t5/Nighthawk-Pro-Gaming-Routers/Introducing-Nighthawk-Pro-Gaming-WiFI-Router-XR500/td-p/1481350 ''Nighthawk Pro Gaming WiFI Router XR500'' on '''Netgear''' forums] *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/netgears-ces-2018-announcements.43282/ ''Netgear CES 2018 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''' forums] :[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2018/33178-netgear-s-ces-2018-announcements ''Netgear CES 2018 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] <small> "What the XR500 has that the R7800 doesn't, however, is a Gaming Dashboard that shows :'real-time bandwidth utilization by device, ping delays, and many other parameters' :and a Geo Filter aimed at minimizing gaming lag by limiting distance to servers or :other players, getting a guaranteed local connection, and creating black/white lists :of your preferred servers. Other features include QoS for gaming device prioritization, :OpenVPN support and network monitor."</small> *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/2083-netgear%C2%A0xr500-nighthawk-pro-gaming-wifi-router/ ''Netgear XR500 Nighthawk Pro Gaming WiFi Router'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL)
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/netgear/netgear_xr500 |wikipage = |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/ipq806x-nss-build-netgear-r7800-tp-link-c2600-linksys-ea8500/ |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq806x |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a15_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 22.03.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = Hardware is similar to R7800 but with eSATA port removed }} Please insert instructions here

==See also== :[[List of Netgear Nighthawk Products]] :[[List of Costco Exclusive Wireless Devices]] *[[Netgear R9000]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PY316200339 PY316200339] (09/23/2016) :Nighthawk X10 - AD7200 Smart WiFi Router *[[Netgear R8500]] • FCC ID: PY315200309, PY315200310 (v1) :Nighthawk X8 - AC5300 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router • [http://www.anandtech.com/show/9678/netgear-nighthawk-x8-r8500-wave-2-80211ac-router-set-to-ship PR] *[[Netgear R8000]] • FCC ID: PY314200264 (10/05/2015) :Nighthawk X6 - AC3200 Smart Wi-Fi Router *[[Netgear R7800]] • FCC ID: PY315200310, PY315100319 :Nighthawk X4S - AC26000 Smart Wi-Fi Router :IPQ8065 Dual-core SoC @1.7GHz and QCA9984 radio :4x4 design supports 160MHz (or 80+80MHz), MU-MIMO *[[Netgear D7800]] • FCC ID: PY315200302 :Nighthawk X4S - AC2600 VDSL/ADSL Modem Router *[[Netgear R7500]] • FCC ID: PY314100258, PY314300288 :Nighthawk X4 - AC2350 Smart Wi-Fi Router *[[Netgear R7500v2]] • FCC ID: PY315100301 :Nighthawk X4 - AC2350 Smart Wi-Fi Router
